title: Calories in Large Wendy's Chili
meta_description: Discover calories in large Wendy's chili: 340 kcal per serving, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for custom orders.
assumptions: Wendy's restaurant chili, large size (approx. 12 oz), standard recipe with beans, beef, and spices; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and add-ons. Check Wendy's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A large Wendy's chili provides 340 kcal, 24 g protein, and 10 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a large Wendy's chili?
What's the protein in large Wendy's chili?
faqs.a: About 24 g of protein, making it a filling option.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in large Wendy's chili?
faqs.a: Approximately 1470 mg, so watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Does large Wendy's chili have fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, 10 g of dietary fiber from beans and veggies.

faqs.q: Are calories in Wendy's chili different by size?
faqs.a: Small is ~170 kcal; large is 340 kcalâ€”double the portion, double the calories.
